name: Empathizing Quotient
author: Lisa DeBruine
description: Reverse coded (Q#R) questions coded and strongly disagree = 2, slightly disagree = 1, else = 0. The other questions are coded as strongly agree = 2, slightly agree = 1, else = 0. Wakabayashi, A., Baron-Cohen, S., Wheelwright, S., Goldenfeld, N., Delaney, J., Fine, D., Smith, R., & Weil, L. (2006). Development of short forms of the Empathy Quotient (EQ-Short) and the Systemizing Quotient (SQ-Short). Personality and Individual Differences, 41(5), 929â€“940. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.paid.2006.03.017

variableMeasured.name: user_id
variableMeasured.description: Each participant's unique ID

variableMeasured.name: sex
variableMeasured.description: The participant's sex

variableMeasured.name: age
variableMeasured.description: The participant's age in years

variableMeasured.name: id
variableMeasured.description: Each questionnaire completion's unique ID

variableMeasured.name: starttime
variableMeasured.description: The time the questionnaire was started (yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss)

variableMeasured.name: endtime
variableMeasured.description: The time the questionnaire was completed (yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss)

variableMeasured.name: Q01
variableMeasured.description: I can easily tell if someone else wants to enter a conversation.

variableMeasured.name: Q02
variableMeasured.description: I really enjoy caring for other people.

variableMeasured.name: Q03R
variableMeasured.description: I find it hard to know what to do in a social situation.

variableMeasured.name: Q04R
variableMeasured.description: I often find it difficult to judge if something is rude or polite.

variableMeasured.name: Q05R
variableMeasured.description: In a conversation, I tend to focus on my own thoughts rather than on what my listener might be thinking.

variableMeasured.name: Q06
variableMeasured.description: I can pick up quickly if someone says one thing but means another.

variableMeasured.name: Q07R
variableMeasured.description: It is hard for me to see why some things upset people so much.

variableMeasured.name: Q08
variableMeasured.description: I find it easy to put myself in somebody else's shoes.

variableMeasured.name: Q09
variableMeasured.description: I am good at predicting how someone will feel.

variableMeasured.name: Q10
variableMeasured.description: I am quick to spot when someone in a group is feeling awkward or uncomfortable.

variableMeasured.name: Q11R
variableMeasured.description: I can't always see why someone should have felt offended by a remark.

variableMeasured.name: Q12
variableMeasured.description: I don't tend to find social situations confusing.

variableMeasured.name: Q13
variableMeasured.description: Other people tell me I am good at understanding how they are feeling and what they are thinking.

variableMeasured.name: Q14
variableMeasured.description: I can easily tell if someone else is interested or bored with what I am saying.

variableMeasured.name: Q15
variableMeasured.description: Friends usually talk to me about their problems as they say that I am very understanding.

variableMeasured.name: Q16
variableMeasured.description: I can sense if I am intruding, even if the other person doesn't tell me.

variableMeasured.name: Q17R
variableMeasured.description: Other people often say that I am insensitive, though I don't always see why.

variableMeasured.name: Q18
variableMeasured.description: I can tune into how someone else feels rapidly and intuitively.

variableMeasured.name: Q19
variableMeasured.description: I can easily work out what another person might want to talk about.

variableMeasured.name: Q20
variableMeasured.description: I can tell if someone is masking their true emotion.

variableMeasured.name: Q21
variableMeasured.description: I am good at predicting what someone will do.

variableMeasured.name: Q22
variableMeasured.description: I tend to get emotionally involved with a friend's problems.
